title: Justin Bieber mocked Taylor Swift’s post-surgery video 3 months after she called him out for ‘bullying’ her
text:
caption Justin Bieber and Taylor Swift have been feuding over Scooter Braun. source Stuart Franklin/Getty Images and Pascal Le Segretain/Getty Images

Hailey Bieber (neé Baldwin) filmed a live video of husband Justin Bieber hanging out in their kitchen.

During the Instagram Live video, the “Sorry” singer tried to grab a banana off of his counter.

While doing so, he mimicked a recent video that showed Taylor Swift struggling to get a banana after having Lasik surgery.

The clip came three months after the “Shake It Off” singer said Bieber and his manager, Scooter Braun, have been “bullying” her for years.

Fans weren’t happy about Bieber seemingly mocking Swift, but others jumped to his defense.

Some fans criticized Hailey for her involvement, and the model responded to the backlash on Twitter.

Visit Insider’s homepage for more stories.

Justin Bieber may have genuinely just wanted a banana, but fans think he mocked Taylor Swift in the process of grabbing one.

Hailey Bieber (neé Baldwin) filmed her husband on Sunday for a live Instagram video. During the livestream, the “Sorry” singer goofed off in his kitchen, and at one point tried grabbing a banana from a bunch on the counter.

“It’s not the banana I wanted! It’s not the right banana. It has no head,” he shouted, imitating a recent video of Swift struggling to grab a banana after having Lasik surgery.

???? IG | Justin Bieber mocks Taylor Swift’s post lasik surgery video from @FallonTonight where she is upset about bananas on his recent Instagram livestream pic.twitter.com/Rwkh8E3KLP — Taylor Swift News (@TSwiftNZ) October 7, 2019

Hailey, who was behind the camera, laughed at Bieber’s imitation and said, “That was so funny.”

Swift’s mom shared the original video with Jimmy Fallon, who showed the clip during the “Lover” singer’s appearance on Thursday’s episode of NBC’s “The Tonight Show.”

“I can’t even be mad. I’m just impressed that you infiltrated my family,” Swift told Fallon. “I don’t even know how you did that! Nobody has my mom’s number.”

Fans weren’t impressed with Bieber’s impression of the 10-time Grammy winner, and accused him of copying the songstress for “relevance.”

Justin and Hailey just mad that Taylor’s video of the banana got more attention than their lame ass wedding pic.twitter.com/93bPH1jCHm — Taylor Swift Facts (@teaandfacts123) October 7, 2019

justin using taylor for relevance again pic.twitter.com/bU5CwCifrq — spooky gio (@thislovve) October 7, 2019

Taylor Swift to Justin Bieber and Hailey after they post a video making fun of her #TaylorSwift pic.twitter.com/OaID0reRnT — Eric Jones (@SwiftNWineTime) October 7, 2019

no one:

Literally no fucking one: Justin: taylor this taylor that taylor taylor taylor Also justin: taylor holds so much grudge she needs to move on ugh https://t.co/Ss8ZM9Xcr3 — ???????????????????????? (@dbatcjm) October 7, 2019

Other fans jumped to Bieber’s defense, saying he was just “joking” and that the backlash was “ridiculous.”

justin and hailey were JOKING about the taylor video,,, it was FUNNY, they laughed at it like the rest of y’all. it takes justins ass exactly .2 secs to get over a drama believe me despite what y’all think he has no beef with your fav nor does he care. get tf over it — leena (@rickkrauhl) October 7, 2019

justin literally just quoted something taylor said in a video that was supposed to be funny and suddenly he’s a bully and is making fun of her ?? make it make sense — ????. (@radiativejustin) October 7, 2019

Im a Taylor swift HUGE fan. That means I don’t support Justin. But for me. This is ridiculous. Tbh WE ALL made fun of this. Soooo, i don’t get why everyone is so mad at this. @taylorswift @justinbieber https://t.co/5Fc2ds76IT — Guacamoltay ????????????09/04/19 ✨ (@tswiftmeow) October 7, 2019

Some fans directed their attention toward Hailey’s involvement in the video.

One twitter user shared a video of someone telling the model to “shut up,” and captioned it, “if i could emphasize a video 1000x over i would xx @haileybieber.”

Hailey, who was tagged in the video post, responded to the fan in a series of tweets.

“I never knew I could make somebody so upset.. truly I’m so sorry you’re THIS upset?! Lord have mercy I hope I’m never this upset about someone I don’t know!!” she wrote.

Hailey went on to say that she thinks it’s “awesome how passionate” the fan is about Swift, but that hating her is just going to “make you miserable.”

I never knew I could make somebody so upset.. truly I’m so sorry you’re THIS upset?! Lord have mercy I hope I’m never this upset about someone I don’t know!! https://t.co/tNL7bGnRkF — Hailey Bieber (@haileybieber) October 7, 2019

@myyylover listen. I think it’s awesome how passionate you are and how hard you ride for someone you’re a fan of, it’s beautiful how dedicated you are. If there’s something I did to personally hurt you or offend you I’m sorry, it’s not my intention to upset you by any means. — Hailey Bieber (@haileybieber) October 7, 2019

@myyylover but being angry at someone you don’t know does nothing for you. I know cause I been there.. all it’s gonna do is make you miserable. Don’t let ME of all people get you feeling that way. Trust me, I’m not worth the energy, nobody should be worth that energy! — Hailey Bieber (@haileybieber) October 7, 2019

The livestream came three months after Swift accused Bieber, along with his manager Scooter Braun and another one of Braun’s clients, Kanye West, of “incessant, manipulative bullying” in a heated Tumblr post.

Her claim was made in response to Braun’s acquisition of the master recordings from her first six albums. He gained control of the catalog through his purchase of Swift’s former label, Big Machine Records.

Read more: Taylor Swift said she’s ‘sad and grossed out’ that ‘bully’ Scooter Braun now owns all of her past music

Bieber apologized at the time, writing, “I’m sure Scooter and i would love to talk to you and resolve any conflict, pain or or any feelings that need to be addressed. Neither scooter or i have anything negative to say about you we truly want the best for you.”

However, Bieber also criticized Swift in the post.

“What were you trying to accomplish by posting that blog? seems to me like it was to get sympathy u also knew that in posting that your fans would go and bully scooter,” he wrote.

Representatives for Swift, Bieber, and Hailey didn’t immediately respond to Insider’s requests for comment.

description: Business Insider - The "Sorry" singer mimicked a video where the "Shake It Off" singer got upset over a banana after having surgery.. Read more at businessinsider.sg
